name: Houndoom
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: Upon hearing its eerie howls, other Pokémon get the shivers and head straight back to their nests.

attacks.name: Dark Flame
attacks.effect: Discard 1 {R} Energy card attached to Houndoom or this attack does nothing. If there are any {D} Energy cards in your discard pile, attach 1 of them to Houndoom.

attacks.name: Black Fang
attacks.effect: Flip a number of coins equal to the number of {D} Energy attached to Houndoom. This attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each heads.
